Ingin RUU KUHP Dibahas Lagi, NasDem: Ada Semangat Kriminalisasi
04 Nov 2019, 21:25 by Mochamad Zhacky
Jakarta - Fraksi NasDem DPR RI menginginkan pembahasan Rancangan Undang-Undang (RUU) KUHP dibuka kembali. Fraksi NasDem DPR menilai ada pasal-pasal yang berpotensi menimbulkan kriminalisasi.
"Ternyata, akhirnya tergambar di dalam problem Buku II. Apa problemnya? Itu dia, semangat kriminalisasi yang akhirnya over kriminalisasi. Hal-hal perintil, hal-hal yang tidak perlu dijadikan hukum pidana akhirnya juga diatur di situ," kata Ketua Fraksi NasDem Taufik Basari di Kompleks MPR/DPR, Senayan, Jakarta, Senin (4/11/2019).
Namun demikian, Taufik tidak menjawab dengan lugas pasal apa yang berpotensi menjadi alat untuk kriminalisasi. Dia hanya menyinggung soal Bab Kesusilaan.
"Yang terutama sebenarnya di Bab Kesusilaan. Bab Kesusilaan itu dari nama babnya saja sudah keliru menurut saya," ucapnya.
Kemudian soal pasal yang berkaitan dengan hukum atau living law, yakni Pasal 2. NasDem menilai pasal tersebut dapat menimbulkan semangat penegakan hukum yang keliru.
"Apa itu semangat hukum? Semangat hukum untuk berlomba-lomba menjadikan satu norma yang berlaku di masyarakat menjadi pidana. Kemudian semangat yang menjadikan hukum pidana ini adalah obat dari segala permasalahan, solusi semua hal. Jadi dianggap permasalahan-permasalahan yang ada di masyarakat itu selesai dengan hukum pidana dan pemidanaan. Nah sementara nggak seperti itu," papar Taufik.
"Nah kalau itu yang terjadi semangatnya akhirmya terjadi yang seperti sekarang, dikit-dikit lapor, dikit-dikit lapor. Orang ngeliat ada masalah ini, yaudah kita pidanakan," imbuhnya.

Want Criminal Code Bill To Be Discussed Again, NasDem: There is a Spirit of Criminalization
04 Nov 2019, 21:25 by Mochamad Zhacky
Jakarta - NasDem faction of the Indonesian House of Representatives wants the discussion of the Draft Law (RUU) of the Criminal Code to be reopened. The NasDem DPR faction considers that there are articles that have the potential to cause criminalization.
"It turns out, it is finally illustrated in the Book II problem. What is the problem? There it is, the spirit of criminalization that eventually over-criminalization. The things that are important, things that do not need to be made criminal law are finally also regulated there," said Chairman of the NasDem Taufik Faction. Basari in the MPR / DPR Complex, Senayan, Jakarta, Monday (11/04/2019).
However, Taufik did not answer straightforwardly what article had the potential to be a tool for criminalization. He only mentioned the Chapter of Decency.
"The main thing is actually in the Decency Chapter. The Decency Chapter from the chapter name alone is wrong in my opinion," he said.
Then the matter of the article relating to law or living law, namely Article 2. NasDem assesses that article can lead to the spirit of wrong law enforcement.
"What is the spirit of the law? The spirit of the law to compete to make a norm that applies in society becomes a crime. Then the spirit that makes this criminal law is a cure of all problems, solutions to all things. So it is considered that the problems in the community are finished with criminal law and punishment. Now, it's not like that, "said Taufik.
"Now if that's what happens the spirit finally happens, which is like now, a little report, a little report. People see this problem, let's say it," he added.
